creator: anders@blaagaard.net
text:
I'm testing ISO-8859-1 encoded web-pages.
The HTTP proxy used to be able to record ISO-8859-1 characters posted in forms
(if the default encoding or -Dfile.encoding of the JMeter JVM was the same as
the web-sites). Works in 1.9.1, but stopped working from 2.0
Seems to be fixed - see Bug 28767
creator: sebb@apache.org
